text: Uma Rosa com Amor is a Brazilian telenovela produced and broadcast by Rede Globo. It premiered on 23 October 1972 and ended on 29 June 1973, with a total of 221 episodes. It's the eleventh "novela das sete" to be aired at the timeslot. It is created by Vicente Sesso and directed by Walter Campos.Uma Rosa com Amor - Curiosidades == Cast == {|class="wikitable sortable" |- style="background:#ccc;" ! Ator !!
